pullRequest.title: Add access control check for SHOW CRETAE TABLE and VIEW

afterCommit.message: Add access control check for SHOW CRETAE TABLE and VIEW

nodes.bodyText: I think we should remove this method like #2899. Users should be allowed to display list of columns that they are allowed to query.
(no change requested) it is strange that one has ALL and other has OWNERSHIP. Should I file an issue for that?
